DataElement.preferredName: Third Cycle Consolidation Therapy Administered Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the patient having received or been administered cycle 3 or 4 consolidation therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the third cycle of consolidation therapy, chemotherapy treatments given after induction chemotherapy to further reduce the number of cancer cells, having been administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Following the second position in an ordering or series.:An event or sequence of events that constitute round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:Chemotherapy treatments given after induction chemotherapy to further reduce the number of cancer cells.

Concepts.definition: Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
Treatment that is given after initial therapy to kill any remaining cancer cells.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
